ai-tha-ap51:2.1_0: being disillusioned, dispassionate, and freed regarding the Buddhas,
ai-tha-ap51:2.2_0: Ten thousand people making a thousand Campaka
ai-tha-ap51:2.3_0: gave a large crowd to people
ai-tha-ap51:3.3_0: My mind is serene with a thought
ai-tha-ap51:3.4_0: I announce to the supreme city.
ai-tha-ap51:4.2_0: the supreme Teacher in the world
ai-tha-ap51:5.3_0: I shall extol the darkness with you,
ai-tha-ap51:5.4_0: Listen to me, I will speak.
ai-tha-ap51:6.1_0: This is the fruit of dying.
ai-tha-ap51:6.2_0: he’ll go on what is given.
ai-tha-ap51:7.1_0: In this way he went back to the beginning.
ai-tha-ap51:7.3_0: like a trunking in the ownership.
ai-tha-ap51:8.1_0: Even though you have been borrowed
ai-tha-ap51:8.2_0: there will be no rebirth in hell.
ai-tha-ap51:8.4_0: will go to a human state.
ai-tha-ap51:9.1_0: the Great Sakyas, the great dragon
ai-tha-ap51:9.2_0: the world with its gods, Māras and Brahmās,
ai-tha-ap51:10.2_0: you’ve been accused like a tortoise:
ai-tha-ap51:11.4_0: Talking the truths will come out.
ai-tha-ap51:12.1_0: this is the question, this is the question.
ai-tha-ap51:12.3_0: after worshipping the Teacher, worshipping him,
ai-tha-ap51:13.2_0: by trading his own territory with his own hand,
ai-tha-ap51:13.3_0: he having given the going-forth, the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap51:14.2_0: in the teaching of the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap51:15.1_0: The group of five is finished.
ai-tha-ap51:16.1_0: and he is detached from the past,
ai-tha-ap51:17.1_0: having gone to the King of Dhamma, causing the Dhamma,
ai-tha-ap51:17.3_0: This was my question to me.
ai-tha-ap51:20.3_0: took ahold of the banner in that place.
ai-tha-ap51:20.4_0: Though you’re delightful, delightful is my mind,
ai-tha-ap51:21.3_0: I was a son of my grandson.
ai-tha-ap51:21.4_0: heir to the heir of the dispensation.
ai-tha-ap51:22.3_0: Through that deed and through its result I suffered much in deeds,
ai-tha-ap51:23.2_0: in the last watch, the sage,
ai-tha-ap51:23.4_0: A mortal may see the victor.
ai-tha-ap51:24.1_0: Today is the best in the world now,
ai-tha-ap51:24.3_0: Today is the Final Emancipation in the same day.
ai-tha-ap51:24.4_0: it has been resolved in the presence of the donor.
ai-tha-ap51:26.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Subhadda.
